patterns: How do I get a job on campus
How do I get a job
responses: Log on to https://gannon.peopleadmin.com/ to find your jobs. Also contact Global Office to Check where you can work legally.

patterns: How do I find housing around university?
responses: We got great housing facilities at gannon for international students. How ever if you are Grad student you can contact housing options on the website.

patterns: Where can I find foods from my country?
responses: We have a list of restaurants listed online or you can contact global office.

patterns: Do I need to have health insurance?
Do I need to purchase insurance?
How to get a health Insurance?
Do I need to have insurance
responses: Yes you do need to have health insurance to continue as a student in gannon. Contact marillee001@gannon.edu for further details.

patterns: Do I have to live on campus
Is it compulsory to live on campus
when do i live on campus
responses: If you are under 19 or in first year of undergraduate course you must live on campus.

patterns: Do I have to have a meal plan?
responses: You can view the Meal plan on Metz Life section of Gannon Website. Use the link https://www.gannon.edu/student-life/living-on-campus/dining/meal-plan-costs/

patterns: Can I cook my own food on campus?
responses: Yes, you also have that option, but you should learn how to cook first! LOL

patterns: Can I get a driver’s license?
How to get a drivers Licence?
responses: Go to https://www.dmv.pa.gov/Driver-Services/Driver-Licensing for further information.

patterns: How do I get a social security number?
responses: You should obtain a job on campus to get started with process of social security number.

patterns: How do I open a bank account
How to open a bank account
responses: Well all the major banks are within 4 block radius so just visit their office with Passport, I20 and other douments.

patterns: Can I open a bank account without a social security number?
responses: Yes, you do not need a social security number to open a bank account.

patterns: Do I need to file taxes?
How do I file my tax
responses: If you work on campus you need to file taxes. Also, if you pursue any business interests such as trading stocks

patterns: Do I need to file taxes?
How do I file my tax
responses: If you work on campus you need to file taxes. Also, if you pursue any business interests such as trading stocks

patterns: How do I contact my academic advisor
responses: There is faculty page on the Gannon website where you can find the means to contact the advisor.

patterns: Where can I find my schedule?
Where can I see my timetable
responses: Your schedule is decided once you meet with your advisor after orientation.

patterns: How do I register for courses?
How do I select my subjects
responses: Your advisor will help you register the courses online at self-service on Gannon where you can choose your courses from the catalog.

patterns: Do I need to take the English Language Placement exam
Is it compulsory to take ESL
Do I Need to take English Proficiency test
Do I need to give ESL
responses: If you do not meet the minimum requirement for your prospective course’s English proficiency score you must take the exam.

patterns: When do I pay my tuition
how do i pay my fees
how do i pay my tution
responses: You pay your deposit before arrival and the rest of it within the week of your arrival.

patterns: Can I get a single room on campus
Is it possible to get a single room on campus
how to get a single room
responses: You need to get in touch of resident advisor at Gannon.

patterns: Do the residence halls on campus have private bathrooms
Do we have a private bathroom at resident
responses: Yes, most of the resident halls at Gannon have private bathrooms.

patterns: Where can I find my place of worship for my faith group?
responses: There are various groups at Gannon where you can confine as your faith and you can pray anywhere you like.

patterns: Is there halal food in the cafeteria
Can I get halal food in cafetaria
responses: No, there is no halal food in cafeteria. But there are restaurants nearby where you can find them. eg. Shish Kabab

patterns: Is there vegetarian food available in the cafeteria
can i get vegeterian food in cafeteria
responses: Yes, vegetarian food is available in cafeteria. But there is limited selection.

patterns: Give me some information about gannon
responses: Gannon University is comprised of two vibrant campuses in Erie, Pa. and Ruskin, Fla. Gannons Erie campus is central to many businesses and organizations that provide students with hands-on learning opportunities. This urban campus in the heart of downtown is within walking distance to restaurants, shopping, entertainment and Lake Erie beaches close by, and is just within a two-hour drive of Cleveland, Buffalo and Pittsburgh. Gannons Ruskin campus is a dynamic and beautiful area between Tampa and Bradenton that rates highly on measures of livability and attractiveness. The campus puts you at the center of a rapidly expanding healthcare sector with opportunities to engage in educational outreach activities.

patterns: Where can i find my course
responses: Check our catalogs at https://www.gannon.edu/academic-offerings/academic-catalogs/

patterns: Who is the president of gannon university
Who is the president of the universiity
responses: In May 2011, Keith Taylor, Ph.D. was appointed the seventh president of Gannon University, a Catholic, diocesan, comprehensive university founded in 1925 by Archbishop John Mark Gannon.
